articles.author: Hormaz Fatakia
articles.title: Vedanta shares fall to a 52-week low - Know how much more can the stock fall as per charts - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Vedanta's shares are now down 27 percent so far in 2023. The stock had declined another 10 percent in 2022. Shares had doubled in value in 2021 riding on a strong commodity cycle and Anil Agarwal-led promoters partially increasing their stake in the company.

articles.author: Ritu Singh
articles.title: RBI issues revised norms on bank investment portfolio effective April 2024 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The guidelines, aimed at ensuring transparency and stability in the banking sector, introduce a framework for banks to categorise their investments and specify how they should be valued and managed.
